verses.verse: A Psalm, a Song for the sabbath day. It is a <S%H2896>good<s%> thing to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And to sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, O Most <S%H5945>High<s%>;
To show <S%H5046>forth<s%> thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, And thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> every <S%H3915>night<s%>,
With an instrument of ten <S%H6218>strings<s%>, and with the <S%H5035>psaltery<s%>; With a solemn <S%H1902>sound<s%> upon the <S%H3658>harp<s%>.
For <S%H3068>thou<s%>, Jehovah, hast made me <S%H8055>glad<s%> through thy <S%H6467>work<s%>: I will <S%H7442>triumph<s%> in the <S%H4639>works<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hands<s%>.
How <S%H1431>great<s%> are thy <S%H4639>works<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>! Thy <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> are <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6009>deep<s%>.
A <S%H1198>brutish<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> <S%H3684>not<s%>; Neither doth a fool understand <S%H995>this<s%>:

When the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6524>spring<s%> as the <S%H6212>grass<s%>, And when all the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> do <S%H6692>flourish<s%>; It is that they shall be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
But <S%H3068>thou<s%>, O Jehovah, art on <S%H4791>high<s%> for <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.

For <S%H341><s%>, lo, thine enemies, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H341>For<s%>, lo, thine enemies shall <S%H6>perish<s%>; All the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> shall be <S%H6504>scattered<s%>.
But my <S%H7161>horn<s%> hast thou exalted like the horn of the <S%H7214>wild-ox<s%>: I am <S%H1101>anointed<s%> with <S%H7488>fresh<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>.

Mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> also hath <S%H5027>seen<s%> my desire on mine <S%H7790>enemies<s%>, Mine <S%H241>ears<s%> have <S%H8085>heard<s%> my desire of the <S%H7489>evil-doers<s%> that rise up against <S%H6965>me<s%>.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H6524>flourish<s%> like the <S%H8558>palm-tree<s%>: He shall <S%H7685>grow<s%> like a <S%H730>cedar<s%> in <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>.
They are <S%H8362>planted<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; They shall <S%H6524>flourish<s%> in the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>.
They shall still bring forth <S%H5107>fruit<s%> in old <S%H7872>age<s%>; They shall be full of <S%H1879>sap<s%> and <S%H7488>green<s%>:
To <S%H5046>show<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H3477>upright<s%>; He is my <S%H6697>rock<s%>, and there is no unrighteousness in <S%H5766>him<s%>.
